title: I am, by far, the most toxic LoL player. AMA.
body: I saw that someone else did an AMA and I am jumping on the bandwagon.

replies.body: do you perform gods work in every game you play or do you try to hold yourself back sometimes

> [{quoted}](name=Kataphract,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oZbQAwIf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-14T08:54:50.831+0000)
>
> do you perform gods work in every game you play or do you try to hold yourself back sometimes

I don't really try anymore. I never really have unless I wanted to get that next rank or wanted someone on the enemy team to lose. Like, if an enemy player was in their promos and needed a win, I would try as hard as I could to make them lose. Same with my teammates. Bad players do not deserve to win games.
you  sound like a toxic troll/bad player yourself man. not a good thing to do to your own teammates.

> [{quoted}](name=surferfijio,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oZbQAwIf,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-14T12:34:30.764+0000)
>
> you  sound like a toxic troll/bad player yourself man. not a good thing to do to your own teammates.

The title of this thread indicates so.

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oZbQAwIf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-14T10:50:43.659+0000)
>
> http://i3.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/004/188/toilet_paper_dilemma.jpg
> 
> A or B ?

B unless you have a cat or a toddler.

https://imgflip.com/s/meme/Matrix-Morpheus.jpg

what if i told you i dont wipe
Goes over as long as you don't leave it hanging too long, no one wants it wiping against the floor and wall, thats just grotty.
